references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset of annotated 3D objects, which serves as a crucial resource for training and evaluating 3D generation models, and is used by the presented method.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, a powerful approach to image synthesis that is foundational to many current 3D generation techniques, including the one presented.
This paper introduces a method for generating 3D models from text prompts using 2D diffusion models, a pioneering approach that influences subsequent research in the field.

references.paper_title: Structured 3d latents for scalable and versatile 3d generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a method called Trellis, which generates structured 3D latents for scalable and versatile 3D generation and is also used to construct detailverse data.

references.paper_title: What matters when repurposing diffusion models for general dense perception tasks?
references.reason: This paper introduces a method called GenPercept which can be used for Normal Regression network by replacing input noise with VAE-encoded images.
